ch0003_90_calme/0101_0701_02_10: Why don’t you join me again today!
ch0003_90_calme/7101_0701_01_10: I’ve met many Trainers since coming to Pasio.
ch0003_90_calme/7101_0701_02_10:
Everyone is so strong, and it made me realize how
big the world is.
ch0003_90_calme/7102_0701_01_10:
I was talking to Blue the other day, and he said
my Greninja looks like an actual ninja.
ch0003_90_calme/7102_0701_02_10:
That made me curious, so I think I’ll ask Koga
about ninjas later.
ch0003_90_calme/7103_0701_01_10:
I have four friends who started their journeys in
Kalos with me.
ch0003_90_calme/7103_0701_02_10:
When we meet up, we get so excited talking
about our memories from our journeys.
ch0003_90_calme/7104_0701_01_10:
I believe it’s important to always stay calm
in battle.
ch0003_90_calme/7104_0701_02_10:
If you panic just because you’re in a pinch, you
might miss your chance to turn it around.
ch0003_90_calme/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you ever feel down after comparing yourself
to someone else, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0003_90_calme/7105_0701_02_10:
I realized that it doesn’t matter how different you
are from others.
ch0003_90_calme/7105_0701_03_10:
Rather than comparing yourself to others, you
should be comparing yourself to your past self,
to see how far you’ve come.
ch0003_90_calme/1701_0701_02_10:
I was looking for you because I wanted to give
you this.
ch0003_90_calme/1701_0702_01_10: I think it’ll come in handy.
ch0003_90_calme/2501_0701_01_10: I prefer clothes that are easy to move around in.
ch0003_90_calme/2501_0701_02_10:
These clothes aren’t really my preferred style, so it
can be uncomfortable at times.
ch0003_90_calme/2501_0701_03_10:
But in a serious battle, these feel so official that
they actually calm me down.
ch0003_90_calme/2501_0702_01_10:
Recently, Serena complimented me by saying these
clothes suit me well.
ch0003_90_calme/2501_0702_02_10:
I was relieved because Serena is way more
knowledgeable about fashion than me.
ch0003_90_calme/2501_0702_03_10:
It can be nice to use your outfit to change
your mood.
ch0003_90_calme/2511_0701_01_10:
I still dream about the day I started my journey
in Kalos.
ch0003_90_calme/2511_0701_02_10:
There have been many fun times and frustrating
times, but I’m happy that I started my journey.
ch0003_90_calme/2511_0701_03_10: I feel like I’ve come very far.
ch0003_90_calme/2511_0702_01_10:
If Serena weren’t my neighbor, I don’t think I
would have become as strong as I am now.
ch0003_90_calme/2511_0702_02_10:
I kept working hard—not just for my journey but
also because I had Serena as my rival.
ch0003_90_calme/3001_0701_01_10:
Hey, are you going to do some morning training,
too? Would you like to join me?
ch0003_90_calme/3003_0701_01_10:
I can’t help but get sleepy this time of day.
Let’s talk a bit for a change of pace!
ch0003_90_calme/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s so dark outside. I shouldn’t stay up too late,
or I’ll be feeling it tomorrow.
